      • searchUser

        Visitor searchUser(Visitor visitor)
        The searchUser() method searches for a username in database by taking parameter username . It is used for authenticating a user. If user exists then the details about the user is populated in a Visitor object and is returned.
        Parameters:
        visitor - (username)
        Returns:
        visitor found
        Throws:
        FERSGenericException
